alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued December 02 at 1:13PM CST until December 02 at 2:45PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Cheyenne County in northwestern Kansas... Dundy County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 145 PM MST/245 PM CST/. * At 1212 PM MST/112 PM CST/, a wall of dust was along a cold front extending from near Champion to 11 miles north of Haigler to 17 miles northwest of Bonny Reservoir, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 65 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar, satellite imagery and public reports. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This wall of dust will be near... Benkelman around 1245 PM MST. Other locations impacted by this wall of dust include Parks, Wheeler and Max. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
